    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        void initialize(AsVersion version,
                AppSdkListener listener,
                Map<String,Object> appProperties,
                byte[] sdkConfig,
                byte[] trustStoreContent)
         throws AsException
        This method is the first method call to the AppSecure SDK. This method is a synchronous methode
        Parameters:
        version - This is the AppVersion(Name and version). The version must be registered in SEMS.
        listener - This is used for callbacks from the App Secure Library.
        appProperties - Properties to the library. See keys with prefix "PROPERTY" in AsConstants
        sdkConfig - This is the SdkConfig file This file has to be downloaded from SEMS-Versionen View "Download SDK Configuration"
        trustStoreContent - This TrustStore-File has to be downloaded from SEMS KeyStores View WebSocket_CA "Download as PEM" If SSL is terminated at Load-Balancer, then the Trusstore has to be derived from the Load-Balancer certificates.
        Throws:
        AsException - AsConstants

      • getPasscode

        PasscodeResponse getPasscode(String userId)
                      throws AsException
        This method returns a passcode and validation time in minutes. This method can be called in offline modus as well
        Parameters:
        userId - The passcode generated will be for this user-login-id
        Returns:
        see PasscodeResponse
        Throws:
        AsException - AsConstants

      • login

        void login(String userId,
           String password)
    throws AsException
        This methode will asynchronously login the user to SEMS. The login process will run in a background task and on process finish the method AppSdkListener.onLogin(com.doubleclue.sdk.api.AppStatus, com.doubleclue.sdk.api.AppLoginResponse, com.doubleclue.sdk.api.AsException) will be called. Requirements: Device must be activated and the methode initialized be be called before calling this method.
        Parameters:
        userId - mut be activated before
        password - This is the user's password. User has one password for all activated devices. If password is wrong the retry-counter of the device will be increased by 1. When device counter reaches defined limit, the device will be disabled.
        Throws:
        AsException - see AsErrorCodes

      • getActivatedUsers

        List<String> getActivatedUsers()
                        throws AsException
        Returns:
        List of all activated users. If List is empty, the App should proceed to the activition GUI
        Throws:
        AsException - AsConstants

      • activation

        void activation(String userId,
                String password,
                String activationCode,
                String deviceName)
         throws AsException
        Activate (register) device asynchronously to SEMS. Once the activation is sucessful, user will also be redirected to login method. The method AppSdkListener.onActivation(AppStatus, AsException) will be called when the activation process is finished
        Parameters:
        userId - The SEMS's user LoginId
        password - User's password,
        activationCode - User'c activation code, generated by SEMS
        deviceName - Unique deviceName for user
        Throws:
        AsException - see AsErrorCodes

      • getDeviceNameProposal

        String getDeviceNameProposal()
                      throws AsException
        This method may be used at activation to propose a device name. The device-name is a unique name for user devices.
        Returns:
        string manuafacture and device modell
        Throws:
        AsException - see AsErrorCodes

      • changePassword

        void changePassword(String password,
                    String newPassword)
             throws AsException
        User can change his current password. This is an asynchronout method. The method AppSdkListener.onChangePassword(AppStatus, AsException) will be called when the changePassword process is finished Note, Password is changed for all devices.
        Parameters:
        password - this is the current password
        newPassword - New user password
        Throws:
        AsException - see AsErrorCodes

      • sendMessageResponse

        void sendMessageResponse(ResponseMessage responseMessage)
                  throws AsException
        This method will be called when user receives a secure message and clicks on an action button. This method is an asynchronous method. App should wait till onSendMessageResponse is called in order to process the response. Method AppSdkListener.onSendMsgResponse(AppStatus, AsException) will be called when the response is processed.
        Parameters:
        responseMessage - see ResponseMessage
        Throws:
        AsException - see AsErrorCodes

      • disconnect

        void disconnect(String errorMessage)
        This method should be called when App exits or when user clicks on "logoff". This method will inform Server and after it will disconnect the server connection. Method AppSdkListener.onDisconnect(String) will be called when the disconnect is processed.
        Parameters:
        errorMessage - set to null for normal disconnect, else message is an errorMessage. This message will be send to server and saved in reporting

      • exit

        void exit()
        App should call this method when it exits.

      • sendQrCodeLogin

        void sendQrCodeLogin(String data)
              throws AsException
        This method sends asynchronously the content of the scanned QRCode to SEMS App must be in logged in state
        Parameters:
        data - QrCode data
        Throws:
        AsException - see AsErrorCodes

      • getAppSdkInfo

        AppSdkInfo getAppSdkInfo()
                  throws AsException
        This method retrives information about the SDK. See AppSdkInfo
        Returns:
        see AppSdkInfo
        Throws:
        AsException - see AsErrorCodes

      • getCloudData

        AsCloudData getCloudData(AsCloudDataKey key,
                         boolean synchronous)
                  throws AsException
        Not yet Implemented

        This method will retrieve the content of a property

        Parameters:
        key - The property unique key @see PropertyKey
        synchronous - If true the method will wait till server response, else onGetProperty will be called asynchronously
        Returns:
        content of property or null if property didn't change since epoch. An AsException will be thrown if property doesn't exists
        Throws:
        AsException - see AsErrorCodes

      • setCloudData

        void setCloudData(AsCloudData cloudData,
                  boolean synchronous)
           throws AsException
        Not yet Implemented

        This method sets a property to SEMS.

        Parameters:
        cloudData - Note: App cannot set global properties. The variables lastModified will be ignored.
        synchronous - If true the method will wait till server response, else onGetProperty will be called asynchronously
        Throws:
        AsException - see AsErrorCodes

      • getModifiedCloudData

        List<AsCloudDataKey> getModifiedCloudData(Date timeStamp)
                                   throws AsException
        Not yet Implemented

        This method is always synchronously. It retrieves a list of changed Map-Data siche epoch parameter

        Parameters:
        timeStamp - CloudData modified after this timestamp
        Returns:
        List of CloudDataKeys which have been modified since epoch
        Throws:
        AsException - see AsErrorCodes

      • keepAlive

        void keepAlive(boolean force)
        throws AsException
        This will restart the KeepAlive timer on the server. This is an asynchronous method. The server has a keepAlive timer for every device. The keepAlive value is returned on AsLoginResponse as login methode return. For example this can be called when App returns in foreground. There is no callback for this OnDisconnect will be called if the connection was lost
        Parameters:
        force - true= sends keep-alive packet to Server false = sends keep-alive packet only if keepAlive running timer is less than half of server's timer.
        Throws:
        AsException - see AsErrorCodes

        The default server's keepAlive is 10 minutes. AppLoginResponse App must be in login state

      • deactivate

        void deactivate(String userId)
         throws AsException
        If this is called while device is logged, the @param userId will be ignored and a 'deactivate' command is sent to SEMS and SEMS will set the devices to delete-state. The localsettings for this user will be deleted If device is not logged in, the method will by snchronous. i.e. the onDeactivte will not be called.
        Parameters:
        userId - this will be ignored in case the devices is logged in.
        Throws:
        AsException - see AsErrorCodes

      • requestActivationCode

        void requestActivationCode()
                    throws AsException
        Throws:
        AsException - see AsErrorCodes

      • verifyPassword

        void verifyPassword(String password)
             throws AsException
        Parameters:
        password - This is the Password
        Throws:
        AsException - see AsErrorCodes
